Articles.Content:
I'm specifically trying to find the kethane mod (it sounds awesome...), anyone who could help with that would be much appreciated.

I'd also like to know/understand why spaceport is not able to help me find it? Also the search functionality on spaceport is highly dysfunctional; if I search for say "kethane", then I can't find the kethane mod. Then if I search for "conics" it actually searches for "kethane conics"...What gives? Is this new or how it's always been? Who runs the spaceport? User community or Squad?

I have the same issue with the Spaceport... the search function doesn't seem that great but it usually works if you use the proper filters.

When I'm looking for mods I have an easier time just using Google with "ksp kethane" or "ksp kw rocketry" or something like that. Searching the forum works well too since most mods have a thread in here as well with links to the Spaceport.

For Kethane, however, here you are: Kethane Mod

Most Addon Releases are...in the Addon Releases forum.

Spaceport is essentially broken; lots of us don't put our mods on it.
If you know the Mod Author you can also search their name to see if they have posted in their forum recently, or see what they have posted.
